name: gif-salmon
description: A modern cross-platform video to gif converter
author: Cookzz

scripts.electron-tsc: tsc main.ts && tsc preload.ts && ng build --base-href ./ && electron .
scripts.build_win: tsc main.ts && tsc preload.ts && ng build --base-href ./ && npx @electron/packager . GifSalmon --ignore=/main.ts --ignore=/preload.ts --ignore=/.angular --ignore=/.vscode --ignore=/resources --ignore=/src/app --ignore=/src/service --ignore=/src/index.html --ignore=/src/main.ts --ignore=/src/styles.css --platform=win32 --icon=./resources/logo-hires-v2.iconset --out=./build/win/ --overwrite
